English: Let all our beginnings be blessed by Bismillah
In the end, we will all become stories

Arabic: وَاسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ ۚ وَإِنَّهَا لَكَبِيرَةٌ إِلَّا عَلَى الْخَاشِعِينَ
English: Seek help in patience and prayer; and truly it is hard save for the humble-minded

Arabic: وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًا وَذِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينِ
English: treat with kindness your parents and kindred, and orphans and those in need
Lo! God see of what you do
